name: dracula's army
description:
dracula's army is about rites of passage, turning wannabe-vampire humans into the real deal, building a secret army while avoiding vampire hunters, and balancing your factions to (hopefully) stop them from killing each other before you can take over the world.

if dracula ever decided to kick it in the back seat for a bit and work as a hiring manager? yeah, that's this
